dish_description: Stir-fried rice noodles with shrimp, tofu, egg, bean sprouts, and peanuts in a tangy tamarind sauce
Spicy and sour soup with shrimp, mushrooms, lemongrass, and Thai herbs
Creamy coconut milk curry with chicken, eggplant, bamboo shoots, and basil
Sweet dessert made with ripe mango, sticky rice, and coconut milk
Shredded green papaya salad with tomatoes, green beans, peanuts, and a spicy lime dressing
Stir-fried wide rice noodles with broccoli, egg, and chicken in a sweet soy sauce
Rich and flavorful curry with beef, potatoes, onions, and peanuts in a fragrant sauce
Grilled marinated chicken skewers served with peanut sauce and cucumber salad
Thick and spicy curry with pork, bell peppers, kaffir lime leaves, and coconut milk. This is the most popular dish from the Sukhothai restaurant.
Stir-fried chicken with Thai basil, chilies, and garlic, served with rice and a fried egg.
Crispy rolls filled with vegetables and glass noodles, served with sweet chili sauce.
Rich red curry with duck, pineapple, tomatoes, and basil in coconut milk.
Fragrant fried rice with egg, vegetables, and your choice of chicken, shrimp, or tofu.
Spicy and tangy salad with glass noodles, shrimp, ground pork, and fresh herbs.
Fried fish cakes with red curry paste, served with cucumber relish.
Fried rice with pineapple, cashews, raisins, and shrimp, served in a pineapple shell.
Sweet and creamy Thai tea served over ice.
Sweet sticky rice topped with creamy coconut custard.
Crispy pork belly stir-fried with Chinese broccoli and garlic.
Strong coffee sweetened with condensed milk and served over ice.
Chilled fresh coconut water served in a glass.
Sweet and tangy juice made from hibiscus flowers.
